A pen can be used as a writing tool to write messages or notes on mirrors or windows to communicate with someone in a different room or location.
A pen can be used as a makeshift ruler or measuring tool by drawing lines on paper or other surfaces to measure distances or angles.
A pen can be used as a stencil to create art or designs on paper or other surfaces by tracing or drawing shapes and patterns with the pen tip.
A pen can be used as a decoration tool to add designs or patterns to furniture, clothing, or other items by using the pen as a stamp or stencil.
A pen can be used as a plant marker by writing the name of the plant or the type of plant on a piece of paper or cardboard and placing it near the plant to help identify it.
